name: ToPeer Corporation
tag_list: private-internet, p2p, peer-to-peer, file-sharing, private-network, photo-editing, photo-sharing, video-sharing
overview:
2Peer.com is a Private Internet solution where one can communicate and share with their friends & family.

2Peer is your own private Internet, a safe and secure place from which you can harness all of the potential of the public Internet - the ability to create websites, write blogs, and share files - and place it under your personal control. With 2Peer, you can create a private social network with your friends & family, similar to a private home or office network, which allows you to easily manage and share your personal digital content directly from your computer.

With the 2Peer photo tools you can easily edit and resize a batch of photos, create albums or slide shows, and share them from your computer with people you trust - privately, safely, and securely!

There are two great ways in which you can use the 2Peer service. 2PeerDesktop is an application that you install on your computer in order to fully communicate, share media, and download folders and files from your friends. 2Peer Desktop is currently available for the Windows & Mac platform, and is compatible with all major web browsers.

2PeerWeb is a limited-functionality web-based tool designed only for downloading files while on the go.
